document.heading: Real Property Tax Deferral Simplification Act of 1982

history.narrative: Law 4-128, the “Real Property Tax Deferral Simplification Act of 1982,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-342, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 27, 1982 and May 11, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 1, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-193 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
